name: Clean IT!
description:
CLEAN IT!

I made Clean It to take part in one of the jam games ever. I made this game within 3 days. This game is inspired by the COVID 19 pandemic, where in this game we are required to eradicate all viruses that are in the house. Which is where the house will be generated automatically so that every time you start a game or repeat it there is always a new challenge.

Take your gun and Clean them all!
